_header: Saint George of the kingric of Cappadocia so clear
_description: The ‘Hours’ of St. George — twenty-one quatrains

BodeMus35.First Lines:
SAynt George of kyngryk of Capidous so clereThurght merett of
                    þi Matens y pray þe me here…
BodeMus35.Last Lines:
…[ ] me fot þi mercy & y mekill mightþat of may
                    [ ] & hy ryȝt
BodeMus35.Note: The writing is very faint and partly illegible.
BodeMus35.Editions:
Hammerle,  Karl. 
             “Verstreute me und frühne Lyrik.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         166 (1935): 195-204: 200-2.
